entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , St. Anthony
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:35 PM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -21.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Anthony Airport 12:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -21.3°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -23.8°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 25 except minus 18 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25 except minus 18 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023
